I've always wondered if there was a way to do this.

So, the moral of this story is, if you're writing a program to test out the strength of your naming scheme, don't use that scheme for your naming scheme.

You're not the first person to make that observation.

This is a good way to find the worst naming scheme.

But what if you're trying to find the best naming scheme?

I don't think there's a best naming scheme. There are schemes that are less bad than others.

I don't think there's a best naming scheme either.

Good thing this is a thread about the best naming scheme, then.
